title: Course to Improve Critical Thinking Skills Using Online Argumentation Guidance in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic argumentative structures and academic writing experience
context.additional_context: Anonymous discussion environment using real-time collaboration platforms (similar to ZJUYuQue tools), practice-centered learning through scientific paper analysis

learning_goals: Learners can visualize argument structures and analyze pros and cons using Argument Maps (AM).
Learners can construct arguments integrating at least two stages of critical thinking (awareness → comprehension → evaluation → creation) in online discussions.
Learners can identify and refute at least three types of logical fallacies by analyzing academic texts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
